scripts.buildTarball: rm -rf *.tgz && pnpm run build && cd dist && npm pack && cd .. && mv dist/fastify-drizzle-v2-*.tgz fastify-drizzle-v2.tgz
scripts.buildPackage: rm -rf package && pnpm run build && cd dist && npm pack && tar -xzvf fastify-drizzle-v2-*.tgz && rm -rf fastify-drizzle-v2-*.tgz && cd .. && mv dist/package package
scripts.publish:dry-run: rm -rf package *.tgz dist && pnpm run build && cd dist && npm publish --dry-run && cd ..
scripts.publish: rm -rf package *.tgz dist && pnpm run build && cd dist && npm publish --access public && cd ..
